text: Lamballe is a former commune. It is found in the region Bretagne in the Côtes-d'Armor department in the west of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Lamballe-Armor.Arrêté préfectoral 31 October 2018 ==Sister city== Lamballe is twinned with: * Oliveira do Bairro, Portugal, since 1998 ==References== Category:Former communes in Côtes-d'Armor
title: Lamballe
